channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rotting boards on footbridge, 23rd April
item.description:

item.title: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface problem, 23rd April
item.description:
Customer reports that half of a manhole cover is missing at the location. They have marked it to make it obvious.

item.title: Thistles making playing area unusable., 23rd April
item.description:
There is a huge patch of thistles and brambles growing in play area which reduces the play area significantly! It grew after the major sewage works in the area

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pilgrove Way, Springbank, Cheltenham

item.title: Tree hangs down so that people have to duck to walk up alleyway!, 23rd April
item.description:
